atlantis.engine.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.engine.graphics.BaseEntity
      • atlantis.engine.graphics.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable, IUpdateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpriteGroup, SpriteText

    public class Sprite
extends BaseEntity
    A sprite is a graphical object which can be a simple image or a more complex animated entity.
    Author:
    Yannick

      • prepareAnimation

        public void prepareAnimation(int width,
                    int height)
        Initialize the first step of the animation process. You must call this method before add any animation.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of an animation (Can be recomputed later).
        height - The height of an animation (Can be recomputed later).

      • addAnimation

        public void addAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                int[] framesIndex,
                int frameRate)
        Add an animation which is a set of frame index on the sprite sheet.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the animation.
        framesIndex - An array of index.
        frameRate - The desired frame rate for this animation.

      • play

        public void play(java.lang.String name)
        Play an animation by its name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the animation to play.
